question: How can I request physical copies of my insurance cards?
text:
How can I request physical copies of my insurance cards?
          
        
Insurance cards are issued and mailed by your insurance carriernot by Virginia's Insurance Marketplace. It is important to keep a copy of your insurance card for your records, as doctors offices will ask to see an insurance card for billing purposes.
It can take
up to
10 days
to receive your insurance card(s) in the mail after you have enrolled in a plan, so
do not worry!

I
f
you have not received a copy of your insurance card from your insurance carrier
after a couple of weeks, or you have lost your insurance card
, Virginia's Insurance Marketplace suggests contacting your insurance carrier directly for further assistance.
